segments.text: Your dog is really cute . What's his name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of dog is he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're not sure because the neighbour gave him to us after they moved away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , he sure likes to run around a lot . Is he well behaved ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , he is . When he was a puppy , he liked to chew my father's shoes , but he's okay now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like my cat . She likes to scratch the couch with her claws .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know you had a cat . When did you get her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About a year ago actually . You've probably never seen her though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's not a house-cat . She stays outside most of the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bingo could never do that . He stays in the house except when we take him to the park .
segments.speaker: S2
